name: Port-A-Johnny
description:
In this rage game, you use a port-a-potty as a rocket. Poop to launch yourself around the world in search of toilet paper.


GAMEPLAY

To control the game, just use the arrow keys. If you prefer, you can use WASD and spacebar.

This game is lightweight and should run well on most PCs.



SUPPORT ME

This game is totally free to play. If you're crazy enough to want to give me money, though, there are a few ways to do that.

You can donate here on Itch by hitting the "Support this game" button below the game window.

Alternatively, you can become a patron of my games here: https://www.patreon.com/HawkSandwich
